news.title: Watch: Videos show how Charlie Kirk shooting unfolded
news.summary: The conservative activist and influential Trump ally was shot and killed while speaking at Utah Valley University.

news.title: Starmer facing fresh questions after Mandelson sacking
news.summary: The PM is facing questions over what he knew about Lord Mandelson's friendship with convicted paedophile Jeffrey Epstein.

news.title: Chris Mason: Starmer is losing senior figures at the rate of one a week
news.summary: Lord Mandelson's departure follows a similar pattern to that of deputy prime minister Angela Rayner.

news.title: Farage faces questions over who funded £885,000 Clacton constituency home
news.summary: A BBC investigation raises questions about how the Reform UK leader's partner paid for a home in his constituency.

news.title: Feeling stressed? Here's five ways to manage it better
news.summary: Stress, in small doses, can be good for us. Here are five simple, science-backed ways to manage it better.

news.title: Nato strengthens defences after Russian drones shot down over Poland
news.summary: Germany, the Netherlands and the Czech Republic will be sending Poland more support to defend Nato's eastern flank.

news.title: John Lewis losses nearly triple to £88m
news.summary: The owner of the eponymous department store and Waitrose expects the business to return to profit.

news.title: Phillipson and Powell appear set for Labour deputy showdown
news.summary: The only other remaining candidate, Bell Riberio-Addy, failed to get enough support to progress in the contest.

news.title: UK could see first named storm of the season amid weather warnings
news.summary: Heavy rain and strong winds will affect the UK on Sunday and Monday bringing a risk of some disruption.

news.title: Ireland threatens to withdraw from Eurovision if Israel participates
news.summary: The Irish broadcaster said that Ireland's participation in the contest "would be unconscionable given the ongoing and appalling loss of lives in Gaza".
